Adding a built-in composting system to break down organic waste, promoting sustainable waste management.
Integrating a solar panel on the trash can to harness energy from the sun, reducing the need for electricity and lowering energy consumption.
Designing a trash can with a unique, aesthetically pleasing shape that can be used as a piece of outdoor furniture, such as a bench or a planter.
Incorporating a ventilation system to help reduce odors and maintain a fresh environment around the trash can.
Developing a smart trash can that can track and analyze waste disposal habits, providing insights and recommendations for reducing waste.
